name: Hands Up (Skinner Space)
description:
Tragic story of a car accident in which driver lost his hand. You are his hand and your goal is to survive before the ambulance arrives. You are flying in the sky and you should fight with other hostile flying hands. Your weapon is your blood, shoot blood by using gestures. Game has an unusual control sysyem, to play you need to move each finger of your left hand.

Controls:

  • space - thumb
  • R - index finger
  • E - middle finger
  • W - ring finger
  • A - little finger  
  • left mouse button - shoot

Made especially for Weekly Game Jam 184 "Thumb War"
